title: Lol freezes and sound distorts randomly
body: Only when playing league of legends my whole computer will freeze and the sound will distort and make a lound buzzing noise. This doesn't happen when I play any other game. Both my main account and smurf now have 20+ leaver buster. I don't have time to reconnect after it happens because my computer requires a hard reset and then when I try to re-connect its been around 3 min and they have already voted to remake.. is there any solution? is there any way to get these accounts off leaver buster? I have spent a lot of money on these accounts. If there is nothing I can do I don't think ill play this game ever again.

replies.body: The buzzing sounds and freezing has been happening to a few players, and the culprit appears to be the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html).  A recent update auto-enabled it and has been causing issues.  Disabling it should get this fixed!

thank you this seems to be working for now....am I SOL regarding the leaver buster?

The only way to recover your standing with [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) would be by continuously playing without issues.  Now that the issue resolved, you should be in the clear!

So even though I did not intentionally leave the games, and tried to re-connect, and we know what the problem is now. I have to wait 20 minutes before the game starts? ok...I know you don't care but I'm off to play dota 2. Yall are re-working everything too much anyway
